attributes.action: Save the amazon and re-planting trees around the world.
attributes.additional_details: Nasa satalite shows the scale of the issue. Please help me raise money and aid the amazon. So our children can have a future and preserve the wildlife we have.
attributes.background: Deforestation is a big issue, governments aren't doing enough to protect life. Now we are losing the amazon to a fire out of control. Where is all the help? With little media coverage and no assistance in rescuing it. Eventually we will destroy all life if we don't all chip in and rescue it.
